item.title: I Want to Believe
item.author: rszumski@gmail.com (Russell Szumski)
item.description: Iâ€™ve been watching the 11th season of The X-Files and it got me thinking about UFOs. In my search for data on UFO sightings I came across a dataset on Kaggle that has 80,000+ documented close encounters from the past 70 years. I also came across a R package called dygraphs, for charting time-series data, and the three.js package, that has globejs: a somewhat silly widget that plots data and images on a 3-d globe.
